archimate:ApplicationService.name: Transport Information to Peer Infrastructure (Application Service)
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation:
Send data into “other infrastructure systems,” as well as a subscriber in our system that is able to obtain data from “other infrastructure systems.” The other infrastructure may be intermittently connected (e. Polar telescopes, space).
Respects definition of information that is allowed to be published, which originates from outside of the pub-sub system, for example re-injection of the same information from an out-of-band source.
SYMMETRIC CASE: define information inside that is allowed to be publishing to the outside world
